xml.data:
Home » 33Y3 Āyatanayamakapāḷi » 2 Pavattivāra » 2.3 Uppādanirodhavāra » 2.3.5 Paccuppannānāgatavāra
2.3.5.4 Paccanīkapuggala
Pavattivāra
Uppādanirodhavāra
Paccuppannānāgatavāra
Paccanīkapuggala
239.
1843»  Yassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa sotāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1844Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ sotāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjati sotāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1845«  Yassa vā pana sotāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
1846»  Yassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa ghānāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1847Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ ghānāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjati ghānāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1848«  Yassa vā pana ghānāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti?
1849Pacchimabhavikānaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjati. Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāyatanañca na nirujjhissati cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjati.
1850»  Yassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1851Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjati rūpāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1852«  Yassa vā pana rūpāyatanaṃ…pe… ? Āmantā.
1853»  Yassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa manāyatanaṃ…pe…  dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1854Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1855«  Yassa vā pana dhammāyatanaṃ…pe… ? Āmantā. (Cakkhāyatanamūlakaṃ.)
240.
1856»  Yassa ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1857Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ arūpe pacchimabhavikānaṃ ye ca arūpaṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāyatanañca nuppajjati rūpāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1858«  Yassa vā pana rūpāyatanaṃ…pe… ? Āmantā.
1859»  Yassa ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa manāyatanaṃ…pe…  dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1860Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ aghānakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ ghānāyatanañca nuppajjati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1861«  Yassa vā pana dhammāyatanaṃ…pe… ? Āmantā. (Ghānāyatanamūlakaṃ.)
241.
1862»  Yassa rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa manāyatanaṃ…pe…  dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1863Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ arūpakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpāyatanañca nuppajjati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1864«  Yassa vā pana dhammāyatanaṃ…pe… ? Āmantā.
242.
1865»  Yassa manāyatanaṃ nuppajjati tassa dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
1866Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ acittakānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ manāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati. Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ manāyatanañca nuppajjati dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati.
1867«  Yassa vā pana dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa manāyatanaṃ nuppajjatīti? Āmantā.
